title: Teach Me
description: This is an alternate title/cover edition for B01M04PNMH Book Three in the highly addictive The Wolf Hotel series I am not the naïve, innocent girl everyone expects me to be. Not anymore.Henry has ignited a fire, and I will do anything—defy everyone—to keep him in my life. But the question now is, does he feel the same way about me? Teach Me is the third book in the addictive The Wolf Hotel series. Read Tempt Me and Break Me first.
author: Nina  West
